title: Convictions Come Down For Boston Marathon Bomber; Death Penalty Still Possible
teaser: The jury in the Boston Marathon bombing case has handed down its verdicts against Dzhokhar Tsarnaev. Jurors found Tsarnaev guilty on all 30 counts, 17 of which can carry the death penalty.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
